prompts.value: Pardon, how long is the expected duration of the tour? (In day(s))
Sorry, what is the estimated duration of the tour? (In day(s))
Please specify the duration of the tour in day(s).

speech: Got it! To finalize your booking, kindly share your name and email address so I can forward you the summary.
Perfect! For us to finish your booking process, could you give us your name and email address? This way, I can send you a summary.
Sure thing! To wrap up your booking order, we'd appreciate it if you could provide your name and email address. This will allow us to send you the summary.
Understood. In order to conclude your booking, we require your name and email address. This will enable us to send you a summary.
Great! To finish your booking, we need your name and email address. This information will help us send you the summary.
